WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

My laptop was just rebuilt (Windows 7) - now I can't register the dll.

I get this error:
The module "c:\Windows\System32\CopyPath.dll" failed to load.
Make sure the binary is stored at the specified location or debug it to check for problems with the binary or dependent .DLL files.
The specific module could not be found.

Any suggestions? I had copy path loaded on my Windows 7 before the rebuild....
:-(  thanks,
joan
